CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: When the morphologies of active layers were observed by transmission electron microscopy , the PTATDPP : PC71BM blend shows clearly a fibril nanostructure ( fibril width ∼ 30 nm ) with the formation of a bi-continuous network , whereas the PTAFDPP : PC71BM blend shows a phase - separated morphology without the formation of distinct nanostructures , as shown in Fig.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PTATDPP |
| PC71BM |
| PTAFDPP |

Explanation:

* PTATDPP: This is a material name mentioned in the context of its morphology being observed in a blend with PC71BM.
* PC71BM: This is a material name mentioned in the context of its blend with PTATDPP and PTAFDPP.
* PTAFDPP: This is a material name mentioned in the context of its blend with PC71BM.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PTATDPP |
| PC71BM |
| PTAFDPP |

Explanation:

* PTATDPP: This is a material name mentioned in the context of its morphology being observed in a blend with PC71BM.
* PC71BM: This is a material name mentioned in the context of its blend with PTATDPP and PTAFDPP.
* PTAFDPP: This is a material name mentioned in the context of its blend with PC71BM.

The other term "fibril nanostructure" is not a material name, but rather a description of the morphology of the PTATDPP:PC71BM blend.

Paragraph: When the morphologies of active layers were observed by transmission electron microscopy , the PTATDPP : PC71BM blend shows clearly a fibril nanostructure ( fibril width ∼ 30 nm ) with the formation of a bi-continuous network , whereas the PTAFDPP : PC71BM blend shows a phase - separated morphology without the formation of distinct nanostructures , as shown in Fig.

```diff

| --- |
| fibril nanostructure |
| fibril width ~ 30 nm |
| a bi-continuous network |
| a phase-separated morphology |
| distinct nanostructures |
```

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

```diff

| --- |
| fibril width ~ 30 nm |
```

The other entities do not refer to the value of a material property. "Fibril nanostructure" and "phase-separated morphology" are types of structures, not values. "Distinct nanostructures" is too vague to be considered a value of a material property.
